text: new implants frog warping the little boy
who lost his eyes in an unexplained
attack back in August the prosthetics
can't give back his sight but they do
look natural and will help him to fit in
with other children his mom is pleased
with the new eyes
scratched the surface though and she
admits to feeling an enormous amount of
guilt if on that day I had looked for
him and found him earlier then maybe all
this wouldn't have happened we were so
shocked by how quickly everything
happened he used to be normal now he
looks like this it's heartbreaking being
and his parents have been living in this
room at a private hospital in Shenzhen
for more than two months they're doing
everything they can to try to move on
from what's happened but there's still
clearly so traumatized by the attack
opthamologist Dennis LOM has donated his
services to the family he hopes
cutting-edge technology will someday
help the boy regain some sight in the
near future we are talking about some
special device to help him you know to
sort of get in touch with to grow more
for mobility for navigation and also for
spot reading or maybe some simple games
beeping loves to play with paper making
boats and airplanes he also confessed to
me dreams of becoming a police officer
those dreams may be far-fetched for now
his family want him to focus on being
happy and enjoying a childhood that was
almost taken away from him
